metadata.title: CVE-2024-21015 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - medium
metadata.description: Vulnerability in the MySQL Server product of Oracle MySQL (component:Server: DML).  Supported versions that are affected are 8.0.34 and priorand  8.3.0 and prior. Easily exploitable vulnerability allows highprivileged attacker with network access via multiple protocols tocompromise MySQL Server.  Successful attacks of this vulnerability canresult in unauthorized ability to cause a hang or frequently repeatablecrash (complete DOS) of MySQL Server as well as  unauthorized update,insert or delete access to some of MySQL Server accessible data. CVSS 3.1Base Score 5.5 (Integrity and Availability impacts).  CVSS Vector:(CVSS:3.1/AV:N/AC:L/PR:H/UI:N/S:U/C:N/I:L/A:H).

criterions.comment: mysql-8.0 package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
mariadb-10.3: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
